Kejn i Son stižu u Srbiju, kao i igrač kojeg je Poketino želeo da poštedi neugodnog puta u Beograd
05 Nov 2019, 13:43 by Zile
Ako je uopšte postojala dilema, više je nema, Totenhem će u Beograd doputovati sa svojim najboljim igračem.
Engleski mediji preneli su informaciju da se Hari Kejn oporavio od problema sa virusom zbog kojih je propustio meč sa Evertonom, na vreme da bude deo ekspedicije za put u srpsku prestonicu.
Ovo je odlična vest za navijače Totenhema i menadžera Maurisija Poketina, koji je posle dužeg razmišljanja doneo odluku da u Srbiju povede i Hjong-Min Sona. Korejac je bio u teškom psihičkom stanju posle teške povrede Andrea Gomeša, ali je Argentinac procenio da je spreman za meč sa crveno-belima.
Ostrvski mediji preneli su i vest da je Poketino razmišljao da li da u Beograd povede Denija Rouza, uz obrazloženje da želi da ga poštedi, kako je navedeno, neugodnog putovanja sedam godina nakon utakmice mladih reprezentacija Engleske i Srbije u Kruševcu kada je Rouz bio vređan na rasnoj osnovi. Na kraju je i Rouz našao mesto među putnicima za Beograd.
Utakmica Crvena zvezda – Totenhem na programu je u sredu od 21 sat.

Kane and Son arrive in Serbia, as does the player Poketino wanted to spare for a nasty trip to Belgrade
05 Nov 2019, 13:43 by Zile
If there was a dilemma at all, there would be no more, Tottenham will travel to Belgrade with its best player.
English media reported that Harry Kane was recovering from a virus problem that caused him to miss a match with Everton, in time to be part of an expedition to travel to the Serbian capital.
This is great news for Tottenham fans and manager Maurisi Poketin, who, after much thought, made the decision to bring Hyong-Min Son to Serbia as well. The Korean man was in a bad mental state after a serious injury to Andre Gomes, but the Argentinean estimated he was ready for the match with the Reds and Whites.
Island media also reported that Poketino was considering whether to bring Denny Rose to Belgrade, explaining that he wanted to spare him, as reported, an unpleasant trip seven years after the England and Serbia national teams played in Krusevac when Rose was insulted at racial basis. Eventually, Rose also found a place among travelers for Belgrade.
The match between Red Star and Tottenham is on Wednesday at 9pm.
